message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be highly valuable to you.  I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I understand your position, the value of this product to you is significant, and $11,000 is quite a bit below what I can accept.  How about we settle at $13,000?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $12,500?
